title: Coordinated Fires Asset Management
description: A fires officer must deconflict and synchronize artillery, naval gunfire, and close air support to suppress enemy defenses.

tasks.description: Receive a list of targets and desired effects from the ground force commander.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly processes the fire support request.

tasks.description: Assign the most suitable fire support asset to each target (e.g., naval guns for coastal targets, precision air strikes for point targets).
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer makes optimal pairings of assets to targets.

tasks.description: Create a synchronized firing schedule that ensures all ordnance impacts the targets simultaneously.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a valid and deconflicted fire plan.
